translations: n.[专利] 转让人，让与人

sentences.sentence: The Transferors own the Equity interest free and clear of encumbrances of any kind, other than the security interest pursuant to the Pledge Agreement.
sentences.translation: 转让人所持有的股权上没有任何权利负担，《质押协议》项下的担保权益除外。

sentences.sentence: The CCW framework, which includes all major producers, users and transferors of cluster munitions, provides the most appropriate platform for addressing cluster munitions issue.
sentences.translation: 《特定常规武器公约》包括了集束弹药主要生产、使用和转让大国，是处理集束弹药问题最合适的场所。
